trans-unit.target: TEXT_GUILDORDERGUIDE_SELECT_MENU_TITLE<tab>What might you be interested in today?
TEXT_GUILDORDERGUIDE_INFO_TALK_00<tab>Guildhests are small party-based operations overseen by the Adventurers' Guild.
TEXT_GUILDORDERGUIDE_INFO_TALK_01<tab>In addition to being instanced, the battles have varying time limits.
TEXT_GUILDORDERGUIDE_INFO_TALK_02<tab>Rewards for completing the operation are based on your party's performance. A bonus will be awarded the first time you complete a hest with each class.
TEXT_GUILDORDERGUIDE_INFO_TALK_03<tab>A bonus will also be awarded for completing the operation with a minimal number of KOs.

TEXT_GUILDORDERGUIDE_INFO_TALK_04<tab>New operations will become available as you increase in level or as you complete existing hests. Some operations can only be unlocked by speaking with certain battlewardens.
TEXT_GUILDORDERGUIDE_ERROR_TALK<tab>You were unable to commence “<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>.”
